mapper.select: SELECT created_time AS createTime, contract_no AS contractNo, in_wait_wh_total AS inWaitWhTotal, FROM ope_purchas

SELECT parts.cn_Name AS cnName, parts.parts_Number AS partsNumber, purb.in_wait_wh_qty AS inWaitWhQty, pur.contract_no AS contractNo FROM ope_purchas_b purb INNER JOIN ope_parts parts ON (purb.part_id = parts.id)and parts.dr=0 LEFT JOIN ope_purchas pur ON (pur.id = purb.purchas_id) and pur.dr=0 WHERE purb.purchas_id = #{enter.id} and purb.dr=0 group by cnName,partsNumber,inWaitWhQty,contractNo
SELECT count(*) FROM ope_purchas_b purb INNER JOIN ope_parts parts ON (purb.part_id = parts.id)and parts.dr=0 WHERE purb.purchas_id = #{id};and purb.dr=0
